statements: SELECT project_name, location, start_date, budget FROM rural_infrastructure_projects;
SELECT * FROM rural_infrastructure_projects WHERE location = 'Village A';
SELECT project_name, location FROM rural_infrastructure_projects WHERE budget > 50000;
SELECT id, project_name, start_date, end_date FROM rural_infrastructure_projects WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM rural_infrastructure_projects ORDER BY budget DESC, start_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM rural_infrastructure_projects WHERE location = 'Village A';
SELECT project_name, budget FROM rural_infrastructure_projects WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2023-01-01';
SELECT id, project_name, location FROM rural_infrastructure_projects WHERE budget > 50000 ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT * FROM rural_infrastructure_projects WHERE end_date < NOW() ORDER BY budget ASC;
SELECT location, COUNT(*) AS total_projects FROM rural_infrastructure_projects GROUP BY location HAVING total_projects > 2;
SELECT * FROM rural_areas_infrastructure_projects;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM rural_areas_infrastructure_projects;
SELECT project_name, project_status FROM rural_areas_infrastructure_projects WHERE project_status='In Progress';
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date, project_status FROM rural_areas_infrastructure_projects ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT p.project_name, pm.monitoring_date, pm.progress_status FROM rural_areas_infrastructure_projects p JOIN project_monitoring_data pm ON p.project_id = pm.project_id;
SELECT project_id, project_name, start_date, end_date, project_status FROM rural_areas_infrastructure_projects;
SELECT * FROM project_monitoring_data WHERE progress_status = 'In Progress';
SELECT project_id, project_name, start_date, end_date, project_status FROM rural_areas_infrastructure_projects WHERE project_status = 'Completed';
SELECT project_id, project_name, start_date, end_date, project_status FROM rural_areas_infrastructure_projects ORDER BY start_date DESC, project_name ASC;

SELECT project_id, project_name, monitoring_date, progress_status FROM rural_areas_infrastructure_projects JOIN project_monitoring_data ON rural_areas_infrastructure_projects.project_id = project_monitoring_data.project_id WHERE project_status = 'In Progress';
SELECT * FROM projects;
SELECT project_id, project_name, location FROM projects WHERE budget > 10000;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM projects WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT project_id, project_name, budget FROM projects ORDER BY end_date DESC;
SELECT p.project_name, i.indicator_name, pi.impact_score FROM projects p JOIN project_impact pi ON p.project_id = pi.project_id JOIN impact_indicators i ON pi.indicator_id = i.indicator_id;
SELECT * FROM projects;
SELECT project_name, location, budget FROM projects WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT project_name, end_date FROM projects ORDER BY end_date DESC LIMIT 3;

SELECT p.project_name, i.indicator_name, pi.impact_score FROM projects p JOIN project_impact pi ON p.project_id = pi.project_id JOIN impact_indicators i ON pi.indicator_id = i.indicator_id WHERE pi.impact_score > 75;

SELECT p.project_name, pi.impact_score FROM projects p JOIN project_impact pi ON p.project_id = pi.project_id JOIN impact_indicators i ON pi.indicator_id = i.indicator_id WHERE i.weightage >= 0.75 ORDER BY pi.impact_score DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM InfrastructureProjects;
SELECT project_name, project_type FROM InfrastructureProjects;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM InfrastructureProjects ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT project_name, project_type FROM InfrastructureProjects WHERE project_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM Stakeholders WHERE stakeholder_type = 'Government' ORDER BY stakeholder_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM InfrastructureProjects ORDER BY project_name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT project_name, project_type FROM InfrastructureProjects WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT project_name, stakeholder_name FROM InfrastructureProjects JOIN Stakeholders ON InfrastructureProjects.project_id = Stakeholders.project_id;
SELECT * FROM InfrastructureProjects LEFT JOIN ImpactAssessment ON InfrastructureProjects.project_id = ImpactAssessment.project_id WHERE impact_rating > 3;
SELECT project_name, metric_name, metric_description FROM InfrastructureProjects JOIN EvaluationMetrics ON InfrastructureProjects.project_id = EvaluationMetrics.metric_id;
SELECT * FROM rural_projects;
SELECT project_name, start_date FROM rural_projects;
SELECT project_description, start_date, end_date FROM rural_projects WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM project_locations WHERE project_id = 3;
SELECT impact_type, impact_description, metrics FROM project_impact;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM rural_projects;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM project_locations;
SELECT impact_type, impact_description, metrics FROM project_impact;
SELECT project_id, evaluator, findings FROM evaluation_reports;
SELECT metric_name, value, unit FROM project_metrics;
